verses.verse: וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּיתוֹ֙ <WH1004> his own house בָּנָ֣ה <WH1129> was building שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> But Solomon שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> three עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> ten שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיְכַ֖ל <WH3615> and he finished אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> all his house

וַיִּ֜בֶן <WH1129> He built אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית ׀ <WH1004> also the house יַ֣עַר <WH3293> of the forest הַלְּבָנ֗וֹן <WH3844> of Lebanon מֵאָ֨ה <WH3967> thereof [was] an hundred אַמָּ֤ה <WH520> cubits אָרְכּוֹ֙ <WH753> the length וַחֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <WH2572> thereof fifty אַמָּה֙ <WH520> cubits רָחְבּ֔וֹ <WH7341> and the breadth וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> thereof thirty אַמָּ֖ה <WH520> cubits קוֹמָת֑וֹ <WH6967> and the height עַ֗ל <WH5921> on אַרְבָּעָה֙ <WH702> upon four טוּרֵי֙ <WH2905> rows עַמּוּדֵ֣י <WH5982> pillars אֲרָזִ֔ים <WH730> of cedar וּכְרֻת֥וֹת <WH3773> beams אֲרָזִ֖ים <WH730> with cedar עַל־ <WH5921> on הָעַמּוּדִֽים׃ <WH5982> upon the pillars

וְסָפֻ֣ן <WH5603> And [it was] covered בָּאֶ֗רֶז <WH730> with cedar מִמַּ֙עַל֙ <WH4605> above עַל־ <WH5921> upon הַצְּלָעֹת֙ <WH6763> upon the beams אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after עַל־ <WH5921> and הָֽעַמּוּדִ֔ים <WH5982> pillars אַרְבָּעִ֖ים <WH705> that [lay] on forty וַחֲמִשָּׁ֑ה <WH2568> five חֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <WH2568> fif עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> fifteen הַטּֽוּר׃ <WH2905> [in] a row

וּשְׁקֻפִ֖ים <WH8261> And [there were] windows שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> [in] three טוּרִ֑ים <WH2905> rows וּמֶחֱזָ֥ה <WH4237> and light אֶל־ <WH413> was opposite מֶחֱזָ֖ה <WH4237> [was] against light שָׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> [in] three פְּעָמִֽים׃ <WH6471> ranks

וְכָל־ <WH3605> All הַפְּתָחִ֥ים <WH6607> And all the doors וְהַמְּזוּז֖וֹת <WH4201> and posts רְבֻעִ֣ים <WH7251> [were] square שָׁ֑קֶף <WH8260> with the windows וּמ֧וּל <WH4136> [was] against מֶחֱזָ֛ה <WH4237> and light אֶל־ <WH413> about מֶחֱזָ֖ה <WH4237> light שָׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> [in] three פְּעָמִֽים׃ <WH6471> ranks

וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> אוּלָ֤ם <WH197> a porch הָֽעַמּוּדִים֙ <WH5982> of pillars עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> And he made חֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <WH2572> thereof [was] fifty אַמָּה֙ <WH520> cubits אָרְכּ֔וֹ <WH753> the length וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> thereof thirty אַמָּ֖ה <WH520> cubits רָחְבּ֑וֹ <WH7341> and the breadth וְאוּלָם֙ <WH197> and the porch עַל־ <WH5921> in פְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> [was] before וְעַמֻּדִ֥ים <WH5982> them and the [other] pillars וְעָ֖ב <WH5646> and the thick beam עַל־ <WH5921> in פְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> front

וְאוּלָ֤ם <WH197> a porch הַכִּסֵּא֙ <WH3678> for the throne אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he יִשְׁפָּט־ <WH8199> where he might judge שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> in it אֻלָ֥ם <WH197> [even] the porch הַמִּשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> of judgment עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> Then he made וְסָפ֣וּן <WH5603> and [it was] covered בָּאֶ֔רֶז <WH730> with cedar מֵהַקַּרְקַ֖ע <WH7172> from one side of the floor עַד־ <WH5704> against הַקַּרְקָֽע׃ <WH7172> to the other

וּבֵיתוֹ֩ <WH1004> And his house אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom יֵ֨שֶׁב <WH3427> where he dwelt שָׁ֜ם <WH8033> in it חָצֵ֣ר <WH2691> court הָאַחֶ֗רֶת <WH312> [had] another מִבֵּית֙ <WH1004> within לָֽאוּלָ֔ם <WH197> the porch כַּמַּֽעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH4639> [which] was of the like work הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> the same הָיָ֑ה <WH1961> become וּבַ֜יִת <WH1004> also an house יַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <WH6213> made לְבַת־ <WH1323> daughter פַּרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> for Pharaoh's אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom לָקַ֣ח <WH3947> whom he had taken שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> Solomon כָּאוּלָ֖ם <WH197> [to wife] like unto this porch הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

כָּל־ <WH3605> All אֵ֜לֶּה <WH428> these אֲבָנִ֤ים <WH68> stones יְקָרֹת֙ <WH3368> All these [were of] costly כְּמִדֹּ֣ת <WH4060> according to the measures גָּזִ֔ית <WH1496> of hewed stones מְגֹרָר֥וֹת <WH1641> sawed בַּמְּגֵרָ֖ה <WH4050> with saws מִבַּ֣יִת <WH1004> within וּמִח֑וּץ <WH2351> and without וּמִמַּסָּד֙ <WH4527> even from the foundation עַד־ <WH5704> against הַטְּפָח֔וֹת <WH2947> unto the coping וּמִח֖וּץ <WH2351> and [so] on the outside עַד־ <WH5704> against הֶחָצֵ֥ר <WH2691> court הַגְּדוֹלָֽה׃ <WH1419> toward the great

וּמְיֻסָּ֕ד <WH3245> And the foundation אֲבָנִ֥ים <WH68> stones יְקָר֖וֹת <WH3368> [was of] costly אֲבָנִ֣ים <WH68> stones גְּדֹל֑וֹת <WH1419> even great אַבְנֵי֙ <WH68> stones עֶ֣שֶׂר <WH6235> of ten אַמּ֔וֹת <WH520> cubits וְאַבְנֵ֖י <WH68> and stones שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <WH8083> of eight אַמּֽוֹת׃ <WH520> cubits
וּמִלְמַ֗עְלָה <WH4605> And above אֲבָנִ֧ים <WH68> stones יְקָר֛וֹת <WH3368> [were] costly כְּמִדּ֥וֹת <WH4060> after the measures גָּזִ֖ית <WH1496> of hewed stones וָאָֽרֶז׃ <WH730> and cedars

וְחָצֵ֨ר <WH2691> court הַגְּדוֹלָ֜ה <WH1419> And the great סָבִ֗יב <WH5439> round about שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> [was] with three טוּרִ֣ים <WH2905> rows גָּזִ֔ית <WH1496> of hewed stones וְט֖וּר <WH2905> and a row כְּרֻתֹ֣ת <WH3773> beams אֲרָזִ֑ים <WH730> of cedar וְלַחֲצַ֧ר <WH2691> court בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD הַפְּנִימִ֖ית <WH6442> both for the inner וּלְאֻלָ֥ם <WH197> and for the porch הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> of the house פ
וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <WH7971> sent הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> And king שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> Solomon וַיִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> and fetched אֶת־ <WH853> חִירָ֖ם <WH2438> Hiram מִצֹּֽר׃ <WH6865> out of Tyre

בֶּן־ <WH1121> son אִשָּׁה֩ <WH802> ess אַלְמָנָ֨ה <WH490> was a widow's ה֜וּא <WH1931> he מִמַּטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> of the tribe נַפְתָּלִ֗י <WH5321> of Naphtali וְאָבִ֣יו <WH1> and his father אִישׁ־ <WH376> [was] a man צֹרִי֮ <WH6876> of Tyre חֹרֵ֣שׁ <WH2794> artificer נְחֹשֶׁת֒ <WH5178> in brass וַ֠יִּמָּלֵא <WH4390> and he was filled אֶת־ <WH853> הַחָכְמָ֤ה <WH2451> with wisdom וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַתְּבוּנָה֙ <WH8394> and understanding וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַדַּ֔עַת <WH1847> and cunning לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> to work כָּל־ <WH3605> any מְלָאכָ֖ה <WH4399> all works בַּנְּחֹ֑שֶׁת <WH5178> in brass וַיָּבוֹא֙ <WH935> And he came אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> to king שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> Solomon וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <WH6213> and wrought אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מְלַאכְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH4399> all his work

וַיָּ֛צַר <WH6696> For he cast אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> two הָעַמּוּדִ֖ים <WH5982> pillars נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <WH5178> of brass שְׁמֹנֶ֨ה <WH8083> eight עֶשְׂרֵ֜ה <WH6240> teen אַמָּ֗ה <WH520> cubits קוֹמַת֙ <WH6967> high הָעַמּ֣וּד <WH5982> pillar הָאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> of one וְחוּט֙ <WH2339> and a line שְׁתֵּים־ <WH8147> of both עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <WH6240> ten אַמָּ֔ה <WH520> cubits יָסֹ֖ב <WH5437> of them about אֶת־ <WH853> הָעַמּ֥וּד <WH5982> pillars הַשֵּׁנִֽי׃ <WH8145> either

וּשְׁתֵּ֨י <WH8147> two כֹתָרֹ֜ת <WH3805> chapiters עָשָׂ֗ה <WH6213> And he made לָתֵ֛ת <WH5414> to set עַל־ <WH5921> on רָאשֵׁ֥י <WH7218> upon the tops הָֽעַמּוּדִ֖ים <WH5982> of the pillars מֻצַ֣ק <WH3332> [of] molten נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <WH5178> brass חָמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> [was] five אַמּ֗וֹת <WH520> cubits קוֹמַת֙ <WH6967> the height הַכֹּתֶ֣רֶת <WH3805> chapiter הָאֶחָ֔ת <WH259> of the one וְחָמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> [was] five אַמּ֔וֹת <WH520> cubits קוֹמַ֖ת <WH6967> and the height הַכֹּתֶ֥רֶת <WH3805> chapiter הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <WH8145> of the other

שְׂבָכִ֞ים <WH7638> [And] nets מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> work שְׂבָכָ֗ה <WH7639> of checker גְּדִלִים֙ <WH1434> and wreaths מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> work שַׁרְשְׁר֔וֹת <WH8333> of chain לַכֹּ֣תָרֹ֔ת <WH3805> for the chapiters אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> were on רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> which [were] upon the top הָעַמּוּדִ֑ים <WH5982> of the pillars שִׁבְעָה֙ <WH7651> seven לַכֹּתֶ֣רֶת <WH3805> chapiter הָאֶחָ֔ת <WH259> for the one וְשִׁבְעָ֖ה <WH7651> and seven לַכֹּתֶ֥רֶת <WH3805> chapiter הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <WH8145> for the other

וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made אֶת־ <WH853> הָעַמּוּדִ֑ים <WH5982> the pillars וּשְׁנֵי֩ <WH8147> and two טוּרִ֨ים <WH2905> rows סָבִ֜יב <WH5439> round about עַל־ <WH5921> and הַשְּׂבָכָ֣ה <WH7639> network הָאֶחָ֗ת <WH259> upon the one לְכַסּ֤וֹת <WH3680> to cover אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֹּֽתָרֹת֙ <WH3805> the chapiters אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> were on רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> that [were] upon the top הָֽרִמֹּנִ֔ים <WH7416> with pomegranates וְכֵ֣ן <WH3651> and so עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> and so did לַכֹּתֶ֖רֶת <WH3805> chapiter הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <WH8145> he for the other

וְכֹֽתָרֹ֗ת <WH3805> And the chapiters אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> that [were] upon the top הָעַמּוּדִ֔ים <WH5982> of the pillars מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH4639> work שׁוּשַׁ֣ן <WH7799> [were] of lily בָּֽאוּלָ֑ם <WH197> in the porch אַרְבַּ֖ע <WH702> four אַמּֽוֹת׃ <WH520> cubits

וְכֹתָרֹ֗ת <WH3805> And the chapiters עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׁנֵי֙ <WH8147> upon the two הָֽעַמּוּדִ֔ים <WH5982> pillars גַּם־ <WH1571> even מִמַּ֙עַל֙ <WH4605> [had pomegranates] also above מִלְּעֻמַּ֣ת <WH5980> over against הַבֶּ֔טֶן <WH990> the belly אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which לְעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> which [was] by [שְׂבָכָה כ] (הַשְּׂבָכָ֑ה <WH7639> checker ק) וְהָרִמּוֹנִ֤ים <WH7416> and the pomegranates מָאתַ֙יִם֙ <WH3967> [were] two hundred טֻרִ֣ים <WH2905> in rows סָבִ֔יב <WH5439> round about עַ֖ל <WH5921> and הַכֹּתֶ֥רֶת <WH3805> chapiter הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <WH8145> upon the other

וַיָּ֙קֶם֙ <WH6965> And he set up אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽעַמֻּדִ֔ים <WH5982> the pillars לְאֻלָ֖ם <WH197> in the porch הַֽהֵיכָ֑ל <WH1964> of the temple וַיָּ֜קֶם <WH6965> and he set up אֶת־ <WH853> הָעַמּ֣וּד <WH5982> pillar הַיְמָנִ֗י <WH3233> the right וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> and called אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמוֹ֙ <WH8034> the name יָכִ֔ין <WH3199> thereof Jachin וַיָּ֙קֶם֙ <WH6965> and he set up אֶת־ <WH853> הָעַמּ֣וּד <WH5982> pillar הַשְּׂמָאלִ֔י <WH8042> the left וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and called אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> the name בֹּֽעַז׃ <WH1162> thereof Boaz

וְעַ֛ל <WH5921> on רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> And upon the top הָעַמּוּדִ֖ים <WH5982> of the pillars מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> work שׁוֹשָׁ֑ן <WH7799> [was] lily וַתִּתֹּ֖ם <WH8552> finished מְלֶ֥אכֶת <WH4399> so was the work הָעַמּוּדִֽים׃ <WH5982> of the pillars

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made אֶת־ <WH853> הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> sea מוּצָ֑ק <WH4165> casting עֶ֣שֶׂר <WH6235> ten בָּ֠אַמָּה <WH520> cubits מִשְּׂפָת֨וֹ <WH8193> from the one brim עַד־ <WH5704> against שְׂפָת֜וֹ <WH8145> again עָגֹ֣ל ׀ <WH5696> [it was] round סָבִ֗יב <WH5439> all about וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> [was] five בָּֽאַמָּה֙ <WH520> cubits קוֹמָת֔וֹ <WH6967> and his height [וּקְוֵה כ] (וְקָו֙ <WH6961> line ק) שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> of thirty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> cubits יָסֹ֥ב <WH5437> did compass אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> it round about

וּפְקָעִים֩ <WH6497> [there were] knops מִתַּ֨חַת <WH8478> Under לִשְׂפָת֤וֹ ׀ <WH8193> And under the brim סָבִיב֙ <WH5439> of it round about סֹבְבִ֣ים <WH5437> compassing אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> עֶ֚שֶׂר <WH6235> it ten בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> in a cubit מַקִּפִ֥ים <WH5362> compassing אֶת־ <WH853> הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> the sea סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> round about שְׁנֵ֤י <WH8147> in two טוּרִים֙ <WH2905> rows הַפְּקָעִ֔ים <WH6497> the knops יְצֻקִ֖ים <WH3332> when it was cast בִּיצֻקָתֽוֹ׃ <WH3333> [were] cast

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> made שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> And Solomon אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַכֵּלִ֔ים <WH3627> all the vessels אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> that [pertained] unto the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵ֚ת <WH853> מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> the altar הַזָּהָ֔ב <WH2091> of gold וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַשֻּׁלְחָ֗ן <WH7979> and the table אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> and לֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> the bread הַפָּנִ֖ים <WH6440> of the Presence זָהָֽב׃ <WH2091> of gold

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַ֠מְּנֹרוֹת <WH4501> And the candlesticks חָמֵ֨שׁ <WH2568> five מִיָּמִ֜ין <WH3225> on the right וְחָמֵ֧שׁ <WH2568> [side] and five מִשְּׂמֹ֛אול <WH8040> on the left לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הַדְּבִ֖יר <WH1687> the oracle זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> gold סָג֑וּר <WH5462> of pure וְהַפֶּ֧רַח <WH6525> with the flowers וְהַנֵּרֹ֛ת <WH5216> and the lamps וְהַמֶּלְקַחַ֖יִם <WH4457> and the tongs זָהָֽב׃ <WH2091> [of] gold

וַתִּשְׁלַם֙ <WH7999> So was ended כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <WH4399> all the work אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after עָשָׂ֛ה <WH6213> made הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> that king שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> Solomon בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> for the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיָּבֵ֨א <WH935> brought in שְׁלֹמֹ֜ה <WH8010> And Solomon אֶת־ <WH853> קָדְשֵׁ֣י ׀ <WH6944> had dedicated דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> the things which David אָבִ֗יו <WH1> his father אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֤סֶף <WH3701> [even] the silver וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַזָּהָב֙ <WH2091> and the gold וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכֵּלִ֔ים <WH3627> and the vessels נָתַ֕ן <WH5414> did he put בְּאֹצְר֖וֹת <WH214> among the treasures בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD פ
